a.detail:
Guillotine Blade: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +11 to hit against one target, 4d10 slashing damage

c.detail:
Scythe Blade: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +8 to hit against all targets within a 5 ft. arc, 2d10 slashing damage

e.detail: The walls here have been engraved with incoherent labyrinths
e.summary: The walls here have been engraved with incoherent labyrinths

i.detail:
Chain Flail: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    initiative +1, 1 attack per round, +6 to hit against all targets within 5 ft., 2d10 bludgeoning damage

m.detail: A narrow shaft descends from the corridor into the next dungeon level down
m.summary: A narrow shaft descends from the corridor into the next dungeon level down

n.detail: A toppled statue lies across the corridor
n.summary: A toppled statue lies across the corridor

r.detail:
Guillotine Blade: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +8 to hit against one target, 2d10 slashing damage

s.detail:
Poison Gas Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 15 save or take 2d10 poison damage

u.detail: Withered corpses are nailed to the corridor walls
u.summary: Withered corpses are nailed to the corridor walls

w.detail: Withered corpses are nailed to the corridor walls
w.summary: Withered corpses are nailed to the corridor walls

x.detail: The scent of ozone fills the corridor
x.summary: The scent of ozone fills the corridor

z.detail: A jingling sound fills the corridor
z.summary: A jingling sound fills the corridor

details.history: The dungeon was created by dwarves as a stronghold. It became cursed by the gods, and has been conquered and altered many times since then.
details.illumination: Shadowy (phosphorescent fungus or candles every 20 ft.)

detail.room_features: A narrow pit covered by iron bars lies in the west side of the room, and a pile of rotten rope lies in the west side of the room

1700 cp, 1200 sp, 90 gp, 5 x diamond (50 gp), carnelian (50 gp), onyx (50 gp), sardonyx (50 gp)
detail.room_features: A magical pool in the north-west corner of the room summons a water elemental to serve whomever drinks from it (but only once), and a set of demonic war masks hangs on the west wall

    affects each creature which touches the crystal, DC 11 save or be teleported to another location

wandering_monsters.2: 2 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); deadly, 100 xp, consumed by disease and madness
wandering_monsters.3: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166) and 1 x Giant Rat (cr 1/8, mm 327); hard, 75 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
wandering_monsters.4: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); easy, 50 xp, wandering senselessly
wandering_monsters.5: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186); hard, 100 xp, returning to their lair with plunder
wandering_monsters.6: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166) and 1 x Giant Rat (cr 1/8, mm 327); hard, 75 xp, tracking the party
